modules.title: dereferencing
modules.description: The purpose of the dereferencing module is to extend the model’s Geo-spatialinformation by set of information through speciﬁed predicates

input.description: List of interesting predicates to enrich the model, and their Objects’ values. The predicates are given in form of map structure where the key is a user-definedname for the predicate and the map value is the predicate itself. e.g. predicate1 http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat

modules.title: linking
modules.description: The purpose of the linking module is to enrich a model with additional geographic information URIs resented in owl:sameAs predicates

specFilePath.description: The path to specification file used for linking process

linksFilePath.description: The path to links file resulted from the linking process

linksPart.description: Represents the position of the URI to be enriched in the links file

askEndPoint.description: ask for end point or not

operators.title: merge
operators.description: The purpose of the merge operator is to merge two models to one single model

operators.title: split
operators.description: The purpose of the split operator is to split one model into two separate models
